data.name: Overage
data.detailed_description:
We know what you’re thinking, the age-old question: what would happen if we put your stereotypical quick witty, gun tot-in, sunglasses-wearing, chain-smoking action hero in the universe of a horror game? The answer lies in this game! Overage is a game that thrives on creativity; allowing you to craft guns that can do anything from duplicating bullets, to shooting black holes! If you end up with a gun that's underwhelming but has aspects that you enjoy, you can always rip those parts off and slap them on a gun that is a better fit for you! It may give your personal gunsmith a heart attack, but he's paid by the hour, so...

Explore a beautiful, futuristic 2.5D world that encompasses platforming, satire, and shooting lots of guns! Don't get too comfortable though, the world of Overage is a dreadful place; overrun by demons and other things that go "bump" in the night. You must exercise caution, for there can be danger lurking on each end of the screen... and there are plenty of creatures lurking in the darkness... some big and some small... but all of them are hungry and ready to sink their teeth into your flesh.

Are you ready to kick some bubblegum and chew A**?

data.short_description: Overage is a satirical fast-paced shooter set in a horrific 2.5D environment; your only goal is to kill as many demons as you can, in the most violent ways imaginable, using the most overpowered guns possible! Yes, you can craft a gun that shoots electric guitars.

content_descriptors.notes: This game is not yet rated by ESRB, but we expect it to contain: blood and gore, intense violence, strong language, sexual themes, and the use of drugs and tobacco.
